item.title: Aquaman Has Been Delayed, Here’s When It Will Hit Theaters
item.description: For a long time, DC's King of the Seven Seas was expected to go on his solo adventure on July 27, 2018, but that's no longer the case. Here's when it will now hit theaters.

item.description: Yep, that's Captain Boomerang ignoring the laws of physics once again, this time so that he can terrorize his DCEU director with the threat of a hug from The Full Jai.

item.title: Studios Want Major Movies To Go From Theaters To Living Rooms Quicker
item.description: Today theatrical films are served up in theaters the same way they are at home, either on discs or streaming online. So, if that's the case, why does it take so long for films to make the jump for home viewing? It's possible that gap is about to shrink significantly.

item.description: While Jurassic World was an incredibly popular film that was also generally embraced by critics, there was one item in the film that lots of people just could get around. Bryce Dallas Howard was wearing the worst possible shoes for escaping dinosaurs.
